body_html:
edit: ^ formatting above screw up:

Basically you have to do this:
if not gfile.IsDirectory(logdir):
gfile.MakeDirs(logdir)
path = os.path.join(logdir, name)

(MakeDirs expect the path to not exist, if the path exists it will fail)

body:
edit: ^ formatting above screw up:

Basically you have to do this:
  if not gfile.IsDirectory(logdir):
    gfile.MakeDirs(logdir)
  path = os.path.join(logdir, name)

(MakeDirs expect the path to not exist, if the path exists it will fail)
